channel.name: PopTV US
channel.title: Law & Order
channel.desc: The detectives proceed with skeptical caution when a radio personality, known to stage fake muggings for publicity, claims to have been shot and almost killed.

channel.name: PopTV US
channel.title: Law & Order
channel.desc: A philandering jeweler with ties to the Russian mob is one of four people shot to death on a sidewalk, and Fontana and Green learn the victim was cooperating with federal authorities until his murder.

channel.name: PopTV US
channel.title: Law & Order
channel.desc: After a bloody massacre of heroin dealers, Fontana and Green pinpoint a drug-dealing Afghan warlord as their primary suspect, and McCoy and Southerlyn prosecute despite pressure from the State Department.
